attributes.action: To introduce a system of student loans similar to those operating for undergraduate students for students who wish to study at a postgraduate qualification
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no governmental help for postgraduate qualifications save for teaching and some NHS related qualifications. The government helps the poorest students on there undergraduate studies, but once a student finishes there degree there is no help to go on to postgraduate level. This is unfair for all students more so for the poorest students.
